profile.name: Mahdi
profile.about: I started my professional path with a 3-month React.js internship that gave me solid foundations in frontend development. After transitioning to a full-time role, I expanded my expertise to Next.js for server-side rendered applications, implemented efficient state management using Redux Toolkit, and optimized data fetching with RTK Query. I have hands-on experience deploying applications with Liara and collaborating through Git version control. Continuously learning, I'm currently working with TypeScript and Materail UI to build robust and maintainable solutions.

messages.offlineError: You are offline. Some features may not be available!

items.description: As a Front-End Developer at Basynergy (Tehran, Iran), I have over two years of experience in developing modern and user-friendly web applications using React and Next.js. I have designed responsive and optimized user interfaces with tools such as Redux Toolkit, RTK Query, TypeScript, Material UI, and Tailwind CSS. I am skilled in deploying projects with Liara and managing versions using GitHub and GitLab. I have collaborated in Agile teams, and my achievements include improving page load speed, optimizing performance, and enhancing user satisfaction.

Online programming instruction for children and teenagers, focusing on fundamental coding concepts, algorithms, and problem-solving. Designing interactive educational courses to enhance student motivation and effective learning.
